title: Value of the slope of a tangent line at a point

content.question: The graph of <math> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mrow> <mi>tan</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </msup> <mo>âˆ’</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </math> crosses the x-axis at one point in the interval <math> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>[</mo> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo>,</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mo>]</mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math>. What is the slope of the graph at this point?

topic.text: 2.3: Estimating Derivatives of a Function at a Point

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
